mapper.select: select idx, title, content, id, case when date_format(date, '%y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%y%m%d') then date_format(date, '%H:%i:%d') else date_format(date, '%y.%m.%d') end date from notice order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, id, date) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{id}, now())
